title: GET_TIMECYCLE_MODIFIER_INDEX_BY_NAME
content:
0x5F4CD0E2// GetTimecycleModifierIndexByName
int GET_TIMECYCLE_MODIFIER_INDEX_BY_NAME(char* modifierName);Parameters:modifierName: The timecycle modifier name.Returns: The timecycle modifier index.Examples:Lualocal modifierIndex = GetTimecycleModifierIndexByName("underwater")
local currentIndex = GetTimecycleModifierIndex()

if currentIndex ~= -1 and currentIndex == modifierIndex then
  print("we're actually using 'underwater' timecycle!")
end
